item.title: Words and sentences: regarding the expressions |guobba ||a, and !kwiten ||a (as applied to the flight of bees)
item.summary: What people say when talking about the flight of bees.
item.comments: 1) This story is found in Book VIII-12
item.author: |han≠kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
